title: Trial â€“ UseMe Labs
description: Request a trial and receive a tailored UseMe Labs rollout plan within 48 hours.

hero.headline: 48 hours to your Lithuanian AI pilot
hero.subheadline: Tell us about your workflows and we will assemble the agents, integrations and success metrics.

sections.heading: What we ask from you
sections.body: Share up to three core processes, the systems you need to connect and a technical contact who can join the pilot call.

sections.heading: Spam and abuse defences
sections.body: The form uses an invisible honeypot, reCAPTCHA v3, IP rate limiting and server-side validation powered by Zod. Submissions are stored in an EU database.

sections.heading: Pilot timeline
bullets: Day 1: process discovery and data validation
Day 3: live walkthrough and action log

sections.heading: Send your request
sections.body: Submit the form in the platform. Prefer email? Write to hello@usemelabs.com and we will schedule the same workflow.
